author: kotkov
msg: Extend the existing fsfs_hotcopy_old_with_propchanges() test.  The problem is
not in the property changes, but rather in the node-id and copy-id changes
happening in repositories with old FS formats.  The test is still an XFail.
committing *different* things that result in node-id and copy-id changes.
After every commit, hotcopy the repository to a new destination and check
whether the source of the backup and the backup itself are identical.
Maintain a separate --incremental backup, which is also updated and

author: brane
msg: Remove the last trivially removable calls of deprecated functions from
JavaHL, and expose the related API changes.
(ISVNClient.revert): Add an overload that can optionally clear
expands keywords and returns (regular, not inherited) file
...info2, and adds a knob to include or exclude externals
(SVNClient::info): Renamed from .info2, adds same options as the Java API.
Add same options as the equivalent updated Java APIs.
As above, and change the method implementations to use:
Reflect changes in the Java API in the native method implementations.
